TopicTitle: We have a pretty funny gender issue in KSP 1.12.0+

Articles.Content:
If a kerbal is recovered in 1.12.0+ the science is only recovered if the Kerbal is female

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/28596

Thanks Nebula056 for an interesting bug to figure out .

If a male Kerbal is recovered any science he had on him is completely ignored

Please avoid characterizing whole groups, even in jest. 

Some content removed.
